data.meta_description:
136 likes, 5 comments - gibsonsbookstorenh on December 28, 2023: "ðŸ“šRyan's Favorite Reads of 2023!ðŸ“š

We measured, and this stack is exactly half a Bookseller Ryan tall. 

Our Queen of Scream read and loved a ton of books this year (well over a hundred as of writing this caption), balancing her Horror reading with several Romance novels, some Fantasy, some General Fiction, and then coming back home to Horror. 

It's safe to say that How to Sell a Haunted House by Grady Hendrix was Ryan's favorite book of the year since she's read it four times so far, but beyond that, she's incapable of narrowing down her list of favorites. Trust us. We asked. She panicked and briefly exploded into a cloud of bats. We didn't ask again.

Somehow, this isn't even Ryan's entire list. There are a few books that were out of stock at the time of this photo, and a few others that don't even come out until next year, so if you'd like to browse her full list, you can do that on our website: https://www.gibsonsbookstore.com/ryan-favorites-2023 (or click the link in our bio)
